summary: Beautifully ornate sword. He who sees it is captivated.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aBgGFlT.png[/IMG]

\"Beautifully ornate sword. He who sees it is captivated.\"

This weapon has been a while in the making, and I feel that it\'s finally ready for release.

I\'m planning on making weapons like this more frequently in the near future, and I\'m going to create a questline to tie in with the weapons.

The 7th Heaven is a penultimate weapon from the Dark Cloud series, and it\'s now finally introduced to Skyrim!

Currently, the only way to obtain the weapon is to travel to the top of the Throat of the World. You\'ll find it hovering in front of the Word of Power.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DcWNuA2l.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fkCC8wwl.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SMvgCbOl.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SITaerQl.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZZHE5iDl.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for any support! Please leave comments to give me suggestions and tips!
Please remember, this is my first sword ever, so please give constructive criticism!
author: halex1316

files.name: 7th Heaven Version 1-1
files.changelogHtml:
Changed damage from 75 to 50.
Lowered weight from 15.0000 to 12.0000
Lowered reach from 1.3000 to 1.2500
Lowered speed from 1.2000 to 1.1550
Reduced Critical Damage from 25 to 15.
Removed dirty edits, accidental changes. This should fix any quest bugs present with my mod.
